title: Classic FPS Collection Ver. 3
description:
The Classic FPS collection is a work of love. The main idea was to have the ability to pop a USB thumb Drive into any PC and to be able to play Classic Goodness anywhere with a nice frontend. Unfortunately M$ turned off autoload from USB which makes my original dream impossible (as far as i know). None of these games are my original works and credit goes to those who work long and hard to get these great games running where we could play them. I did make the frontend and Custom art for the buttons. I have spent a lot of time in getting this to run but it does not mean that it is perfect as of yet. Some games may still crash or some of the expansion may not load properly. If you need to change settings you can dig into the folders ( DATA AutoPlay Docs GOG ) my origination is lacking but all the files are there if you dig. Each game has a EXE or BAT in their main folders that will launch the games from there. You can run this from anywhere I believe but of course it was designed for a USB Thumb drive. It can be started from the DATA folder by running the autorun.exe. Please feel free to let me know in the comments and I'll try and fix them.

**note** if Half-life (including Blue shift and opposing force) ask for a key just 	 put in AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA to get it to load.

Game List. 

ALien Trilogy
Blake Stone - Aliens of gold and Planet Strike
Blood + Crytpic Passage
Blood 2
Catacombs Collection
Counter-Strike
Doom - Doom 2 - Heretic - Hexen - Strife
Ultimate Doom + Doom 2 (Odamex + Multiplayer)
Duke Nukem Atomic & Megaton Edition
Half-Life - Blue Shift - Oppossing Force
Hexen 2 plus Expansions
Marathon - Marathon 2 Durandal - Marathon Infinity
Powerslave
Quake plus expansions
Quake 2 plus expansions 
Quake 3 Arena and Team Arena
Redneck Rampage - RR Sucking on Grits on Route 66 - RR Rides Again
Rise of the Triad Dark War
Shadow Warrior Complete
Star Wars Dark Forces
System Shock - System Shock 2
TekWar
Terminator Future SHock - Terminator Rampage
Unreal Tournament
Wolfenstein 3D & Spear of Destiny
42 games Total

thank you for playing.
